skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Over the years, I've worked with many different languages and technologies. I've built many different programs using Java and C++. Most notably I, on a team of 4, built a Java program that was designed to act as a SCRUM board. This project involved numerous hours of backend development and was a huge success.

portfolio.title: Nexus Project Management System
